definitions.title: coll.
definitions.body: thistles or nettles (LXX a)/kanqai,cf. Ki; Vulgate urtica);—abs. ´[[ק]]:, sign of desolation, Ho 9:6 ( > van d. H. [[קִימשׁ]]; cf. Baer De:Complut.Var.28; ‖[[חוֹהַ ]]), Is 34:13 (+ [[סִירִים]], [[חוֹחַ]]); pl. (c. [[נ]] ins., Thes Nö:M 169, Anm.3 Löw:194 Anm.) [[קִמְּשׂנִים]] Pr 24:31 (> van d. H. [[קִמְּשׁוֹנִים]]; ‖[[חֲרֻלּים ]]).
